ai-patthana15.65:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.65:0.3_0: he used to live with the wholesome.
ai-patthana15.65:1.1_0: Not reciting what is skillful, unskillful is a cause of the unskillful.
ai-patthana15.65:1.1_1: Nor do they give rise to unworthy talk, not?
ai-patthana15.65:1.1_2: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
ai-patthana15.65:2.1_0: Arrogance should not give rise to the unskillful. Nor do they give rise to the spheres of the unskillful.
ai-patthana15.65:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
ai-patthana15.65:2.1_3: (These two discourses should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
